articles.author: Cynthia Littleton
articles.title: 'F1' and Apple's Movie Strategy: Inside Tim Cook, Lewis Hamilton's Big Bet - Variety
articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook pulls back the curtain on the tech giant's film and television strategy, including spending millions on 'F1.'
articles.content:
Tim Cook and Lewis Hamilton are on top of the world. Or so it seems, as the CEO of Apple and the Formula 1 racing superstar stand on the deck of Apple Park’s observatory in Cupertino, California.
